projects.name: FileFatafat (Realtime File Manager)
projects.description: Created a full-stack file manager for solving the problem of document sharing in college labs. Students can now share print files directly to a PC connected to the printer without logging into WhatsApp.

projects.name: Imagineer AI
projects.description: Created a modern full-stack prompt-to-image generation website. Successfully provided a free prompt-to-image experience for users, allowing them to preserve their creations.

projects.name: Turbo Code Online Code Editor
projects.description: Created a full-stack online code editor for students to practice coding. It supports multiple languages and provides a user-friendly interface for coding and debugging.

projects.name: AniKaiser (Anime Website)
projects.description: Created an anime website using web scrapping for anime lovers. It provides a platform to watch and discuss anime, with a user-friendly interface and a wide range of anime content.
